resumes.name: Full Stack Software Developer 000
resumes.description: I work with python in a ecommerce project by more than one year, I used jinja, javascript, jquery and boostrap with this project combined with python. I love how python simplifies the code.
resumes.summary:
I have been working on software development professionally since 2004. I like working on web application development, especially on systems requiring complex backends and cryptography. I also have fun working on projects which communicate with or run on custom hardware.
I have been working in the telecommunication industry and for 5 years I was employed by a large German SmartCard manufacturer.
resumes.history:
- Web site and web application development based on Ruby on Rails and recently Elixir/Phoenix
- Desktop software for Mac and Windows, mostly PDF processing tools
- Enterprise systems in the Telecommunication industry, based on J2EE technologies
- Embedded systems and appliances with custom hardware
resumes.hobbies: I am a quick learner and I really enjoy learning something new on every project I work on. The more challenging the project is, the more I enjoy working on it. less
resumes.skills:
- Website development, both front-end (HTML/CSS/JS) and backend (Rails/Elixir/PHP)
- Desktop application development in Java/JavaFX
- Mobile application development for Android, iPhone
- Knowledge of cryptographic schemes for authentication, signing, encryption, etc
- Development of Javacard based applets
- Linux system administration
